recipe.name: Baked Penne with Turkey and Mushrooms
recipe.time: 1 Hour 10 Minutes (20 min prep, 50 min cooking)

ingredient.description: roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
penne, cooked to al dente according to directions

step.description: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Coat a large 3-quart casserole dish with cooking spray. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add turkey (Â¾ lbs), onions (2, chopped), and mushrooms (8 oz, thinly sliced). Cook, stirring often, until the liquid has evaporated.

Add salt (1 tbsp), garlic (1 tbsp, minced), red pepper flakes (1 pinch), roasted peppers (12 oz, drained and chopped), diced tomatoes (15 oz), tomato sauce (30 oz), Italian seasoning (1 tbsp) and basil (1/2 cup, minced). Stir to mix and coat.
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in the cooked penne (12 oz), 1/2 cup mozzarella, and 2 tbsp parmesan.

Spoon the penne mixture into the casserole dish and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella and 2 tbsp parmesan. Bake until the cheese is bubbly and melted, and the dish is heated through, about 20 to 30 minutes. Garnish with fresh basil (1/2 cup, minced).
